text.panoramamaker.config.override_main_: Use panorama screenshots on the main menu.
text.panoramamaker.config.fullscreen: Take panorama screenshots without changing the render size.
text.panoramamaker.enter_world: It seems you have installed §a§oPanoramaMaker§f§r, a standalone version of §b§oquark§f§r's PanoramaMaker feature. So Now you can take panorama pictures (using Screenshot Key + Ctrl + Shift) and use them for main menu!
